text: Shishupal Ram was an Indian pediatrician. Born in the Indian state of Bihar, he was a graduate of the Patna Medical College. The Government of India awarded him the fourth highest Indian civilian honour of Padma Shri in 1983. He died on 29 October 2011 at the age of 84. ==See also== * Pediatrics ==References== Category:Recipients of the Padma Shri in medicine Category:Year of birth missing Category:1920s births Category:2011 deaths Category:Indian paediatricians Category:Patna University alumni Category:20th-century Indian medical doctors Category:Scientists from Patna Category:Medical doctors from Bihar
title: Shishupal Ram
